name: Yuyu Tuyu
description:
Yuyu Tuyu is a fast paced 2 player game. Your gunshots cost you life! But it’s all worth it when you spend it to kill the other player who also uses his life to kill you!

Developers:

Designer:

  • Jakob Pezdirec

Developers:

  • Gasper čopi
  • Grega Rovšček
  • Lan Vukušič

CONTROLS:

You can charge your attacks by holding down the shoot key to consume even more health and deal even more demage!

Melee attacks heal you.

P1: arrow keys, P - shoot O - melee I - hook

P2: WASD, C - shoot V - melee B - hook

You can play with a gamepad aswell!
